name: BetterAFK
author: kafeijao
description:
Enhance your AFK experience in CVR with Better AFK, a mod that improves the AFK detection and provides a more accurate and customizable AFK state.

**__Features:__**
- Fixes the Parameter Stream `Headset On Head` and `Time Since Headset Removed` to work correctly.
- Sets the `AFK` **bool** parameter, and the `AFKTimer` **float** or **int** parameter (**float** will have decimal cases) representing the time in seconds since you've been AFK.
- Allows manual triggering of the AFK state by pressing the `End` key on your keyboard.
- Configure whether to enter AFK state when Opening the Steam Overlay (enabled by default).

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/BetterAFK) for more in-depth info.
